title: Metacognitive Strategy Development Workshop for Physics Learning

context.prior_knowledge: High school-level physics fundamentals and general scientific literacy
context.additional_context: Aims to improve self-directed learning abilities by utilizing metacognitive strategies for students struggling with understanding physics concepts

learning_goals: Learners can apply at least three metacognitive strategies to monitor and adjust their thinking processes during physics problem-solving.
Learners can execute metacognitive evaluation techniques to analyze error patterns and correct them during physics concept learning.
Learners enhance self-regulated learning abilities by linking online/offline activities and executing learning plans in blended learning environments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
